# Home v9 KC

Home v9 of Techmarket is built using **King Composer**.It has 6 rows. The **King Composer** Backend editor of the page look like this

![](http://transvelo.github.io/docs/techmarket/images/kc-home-v9.png)

## The Code

Please switch your editor to classic mode and paste the code given here :

